data.comment: The big names in today's match at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Moreirense with the kick-off.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Artur Soares Dias awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
Edgar Costa (Maritimo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 8, Claudio Winck (Maritimo) has received a yellow card from Artur Soares Dias.
Afonso Figueiredo returns to the field for Moreirense after picking up a slight injury.
Attention is being given to Moreirenseâ€™s Afonso Figueiredo and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 10, Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
Maritimo needs to be cautious. Moreirense have an attacking throw-in.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Maritimo.
In the minute 13, Maritimo are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Moreirense.
Jorge Correa of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo are coming forward and Jean Irmer gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Moreirense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 16, Jean Irmer is booked for the away team.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Artur Soares Dias blows against Maritimo's Rodrigo Pinho for offside.
In the minute 21, Can Moreirense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Fabio China.
Great play from Felipe Pires to set up the goal.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Maritimo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Steven Vitoria (Moreirense) has received a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rodrigo Pinho.
Rodrigo Pinho is back on the pitch.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Moreirense push forward at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas and Lazar Rosic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Maritimo defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Moreirense in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 29, Walterson for Moreirense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
At Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas, Maritimo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 31, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo push upfield but Artur Soares Dias quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 34, Important block from the Moreirense defence as Rodrigo Pinho fires in a strike for Maritimo.
Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Free kick Moreirense.
In the minute 36, Red card in Moreira de Conegos! Jean Irmer has been shown a second yellow card by Artur Soares Dias.
Moreirense drives forward and Steven Vitoria gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 38, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Pacheco (Moreirense) gets a yellow card.
In Moreira de Conegos, Maritimo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Moreirense's Walterson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 41, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Moreirense, close to Maritimo's area.
Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo is replacing Edgar Costa for the away team.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a second substitution, with Joel replacing Jorge Correa.
Moreirense pushes forward through Filipe Soares, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Moreirense.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Moreira de Conegos.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 45, Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
It's now 2-0 in Moreira de Conegos as Pedro Nuno scores for Moreirense.
Felipe Pires instrumental with a fine assist.
The second half is underway in Moreira de Conegos - Maritimo with the kick-off.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo (Maritimo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 50, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Steven Vitoria for Moreirense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Moreirense's Steven Vitoria looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Moreirense advance rapidly upfield but Artur Soares Dias blows for offside.
In the minute 52, Artur Soares Dias signals a Moreirense throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Moreirense throw-in in Maritimo's half.
In the minute 53, Moreirense's Felipe Pires gets in a shot on goal at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Maritimo drive forward but Joel is judged offside.
In the minute 55, Filipe Soares is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Filipe Soares is back on his feet again.
Moreirense advance rapidly upfield but Artur Soares Dias blows for offside.
In the minute 58, Maritimo's Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo misses with an attempt on goal.
Artur Soares Dias awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Moreira de Conegos.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 61, In Moreira de Conegos, Rodrigo Pinho of Maritimo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Maritimo's Joel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
In the minute 63, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Can Moreirense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
In the minute 65, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Fabio Pacheco (Moreirense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 69, Rene (Maritimo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Felipe Pires of Moreirense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 70, In Moreira de Conegos Moreirense's Fabio Pacheco is caught offside.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Important block from the Maritimo defence as Pedro Nuno fires in a strike for Moreirense.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Maritimo.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Maritimo.
The home team have replaced Walterson with Yan. This is the first substitution made today by Ricardo Soares.
In the minute 74, Ricardo Soares is making the team's second substitution at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas with Galego replacing Pedro Nuno.
Galego gets his shot on target but fails to score for Moreirense.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 77, Kibe is replacing Rodrigo Pinho for Maritimo at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Maritimo make their fourth substitution with Jean Cleber replacing Rene.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 80, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Filipe Soares (Moreirense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Filipe Soares (Moreirense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Moreirense's Galego is on target but unsuccessful.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Lucas Rodrigues is replacing Felipe Pires for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 84, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Maritimo needs to be cautious. Moreirense have an attacking throw-in.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Franck Bambock for Maritimo drives towards goal at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The match at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas has been interrupted briefly for a check on Franck Bambock, who is down injured.
In the minute 88, Ricardo Soares is making the team's fourth substitution at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas with Goncalo Franco replacing Fabio Pacheco.
The home team have replaced Filipe Soares with David Tavares. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ricardo Soares.
Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a fifth substitution, with Ali Alipour replacing Claudio Winck.
In the minute 89, Maritimo's Franck Bambock is back in action after a slight knock.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
Nahuel Ferraresi is booked for the home team.
Artur Soares Dias will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Maritimo, close to Moreirense's area.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Free kick Maritimo.
Maritimo pushes forward through Lucas Africo, whose finish on goal is saved.
That's full-time at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. The final score is 2-1.
Zainadine Junior (Maritimo) heads in to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Fabio China.
Moreirense's Afonso Figueiredo has been booked in Moreira de Conegos.
